articles.description: Steve Cohen acknowledges Mets fans' love for impending free agent Pete Alonso, and calls the slugger "an important part of our team today and hopefully in the future."

articles.author: Stephen Borelli
articles.title: Tiger Woods' son Charlie faces impossible expectations in golf - USA TODAY
articles.description: Charlie Woods made his first attempt at qualifying for a PGA Tour event. Users on social media sensed the moment but they weren't nearly as nostalgic.
articles.content:
The swing and follow-through happened around 8 a.m. ET Thursday morning at a pre-qualifying event in Florida. The PGA Tour quickly captured it.
It was a nice swing, one we have seen before. How coul… [+6378 chars]

articles.title: Joe Mazzulla makes savvy adjustment to lead Celtics win over Bulls - MassLive.com
articles.description: The Celtics outscored the Bulls by 20 points in the second half after a key change.
articles.content: The Celtics pulled off their seventh straight win on Thursday night against the Bulls but it did not come easily before halftime for Boston. The visitors squandered a 15-point lead in the second quar… [+3201 chars]
